name: The Coconut Cup
description:
Wake your inner monkey. Resist going bananas. Coconuts is what you want. But not just any. It is the golden coconut, that you desire. It is the reward for winning the Coconut Cup! (Even if that reward is not in the game :| )

Beat your friends in an everlasting challange of who can achieve the highest score! Climb and jump through the jungle around "Monkey Lake" and dab along the way.

Experience:

  • Bad graphics
  • Horrible movement mechanics
  • Unsmooth animations
  • Buttons without function
  • and fun...

Now the serious part:  This game was made from 2016 to 2017 as a -one man- school project. Enjoy what works and ignore what does not. If you follow this rule , you may can squeeze a little value out!Have fun!! :)
